rules_text:
Haste
[i]With the Wind[/i] – {T}: Untap another target creature you control. Phina, Traveling Dancer explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
